Package rmiserver

Class rmiserver.RMILogin implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

timestamp

java.util.Date timestamp
Private variable to measure the time that have passed since the login request.

key

byte[] key
Private variable to hold the key that was sent in the last login request.

client

java.lang.String client
Private variable to hold the hostname of the last client that did the last login request.

Serialized Fields

ImageConverter converter

The current status of delta precompression usage (false = off / true = on)
